claim: Flublok contains 45 micrograms (mcg) of HA per strain vs 15 mcg of HA per strain in a standard-dose influenza vaccine.

failed_snippets.quote: Across three clinical trials (Studies 2 – 4, Tables 2 and 3) a total of 2050 adults age 50 years and older received Flublok and 2048 received a U.S.-licensed trivalent inactivated inﬂuenza vaccine (IIV3) comparator.
failed_snippets.relevance_explanation: This quote establishes that the comparator is a standard-dose influenza vaccine, which is relevant for comparing HA content per strain.
